src:
Bukan ke Serie A atau La Liga, Erling Haaland Tertarik Bermain di Premier League
06 Nov 2019, 23:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ayah dari Erling Haaland yakni Alf-Inge Haaland mengungkapkan bahwa anaknya tertarik untuk bermain di pentas Premier League suatu hari nanti.
Erling saat ini bermain bersama dengan klub Red Bull Salzburg. Ia tampil sangat mengesankan di Liga Champions musim 2019-20 ini.
Sejauh ini, ia sudah mencetak tujuh gol di Liga Champions. Padahal ia baru bermain sebanyak empat kali saja.
Sebagai catatan, ini adalah musim perdananya bermain bersama dengan Salzburg. Di liga domestik, Erling sudah mengemas 16 gol.
Ia pun langsung disebut sebagai salah satu pemain dengan bakat paling cerah di Eropa. Saat ini usianya masih 19 tahun.
text:
Not to Serie A or La Liga, Erling Haaland Interested in Playing in the Premier League
Nov 6 2019, 23:30 by Bola.net
Bola - Erling Haaland's father Alf-Inge Haaland revealed that his son is interested in playing in the Premier League stage one day.
Erling currently plays together with the Red Bull Salzburg club. He appeared very impressive in the 2019-20 Champions League this season.
So far, he has scored seven goals in the Champions League. Even though he only played four times.
For the record, this is the first season playing together with Salzburg. In the domestic league, Erling has packed 16 goals.
He was immediately referred to as one of the brightest talent players in Europe. At present he is still 19 years old.
